chunked_vad.lyrics_text: Let's make this fleeting moment last forever So tell me, what you waitin' for? I'm gonna keep it frozen here forever There's no regretting anymore
So tell me, what you waitin' for? I'm gonna keep it frozen here forever There's no regretting anymore It's worth to wait, even so far away
I'm gonna keep it frozen here forever There's no regretting anymore It's worth to wait, even so far away I'm making the night mine until the day I die
There's no regretting anymore It's worth to wait, even so far away I'm making the night mine until the day I die No light to break when you're hangin' by fate
It's worth to wait, even so far away I'm making the night mine until the day I die No light to break when you're hangin' by fate You know what it feels like when you're dancing blind
I'm making the night mine until the day I die No light to break when you're hangin' by fate You know what it feels like when you're dancing blind All alone just the beat inside my soul
No light to break when you're hangin' by fate You know what it feels like when you're dancing blind All alone just the beat inside my soul Take me home where my dreams are made of gold
You know what it feels like when you're dancing blind All alone just the beat inside my soul Take me home where my dreams are made of gold In the zone where the beat is uncontrolled
All alone just the beat inside my soul Take me home where my dreams are made of gold In the zone where the beat is uncontrolled I know what it feels like
Take me home where my dreams are made of gold In the zone where the beat is uncontrolled I know what it feels like Come on, make me feel alive!
In the zone where the beat is uncontrolled I know what it feels like Come on, make me feel alive! Feel alive...
I know what it feels like Come on, make me feel alive! Feel alive... Meet me under shining lights
Come on, make me feel alive! Feel alive... Meet me under shining lights I've been waiting right here all my life
Feel alive... Meet me under shining lights I've been waiting right here all my life Feelings you can't deny that you're living
Meet me under shining lights I've been waiting right here all my life Feelings you can't deny that you're living Open up your eyes
I've been waiting right here all my life Feelings you can't deny that you're living Open up your eyes And I just wanna sink into your crazy laughter
Feelings you can't deny that you're living Open up your eyes And I just wanna sink into your crazy laughter Come on make me feel until the pain don't matter
Open up your eyes And I just wanna sink into your crazy laughter Come on make me feel until the pain don't matter Every second here makes my heart beat faster
And I just wanna sink into your crazy laughter Come on make me feel until the pain don't matter Every second here makes my heart beat faster Finally think I found what I'm chasing after
Come on make me feel until the pain don't matter Every second here makes my heart beat faster Finally think I found what I'm chasing after All alone just the beat inside my soul
Every second here makes my heart beat faster Finally think I found what I'm chasing after All alone just the beat inside my soul Take me home where my dreams are made of gold
Finally think I found what I'm chasing after All alone just the beat inside my soul Take me home where my dreams are made of gold In the zone where the beat is uncontrolled
All alone just the beat inside my soul Take me home where my dreams are made of gold In the zone where the beat is uncontrolled I know what it feels like
Take me home where my dreams are made of gold In the zone where the beat is uncontrolled I know what it feels like Come on, make me feel alive!
In the zone where the beat is uncontrolled I know what it feels like Come on, make me feel alive! Feel alive...
I know what it feels like Come on, make me feel alive! Feel alive... Come on, make me feel alive!
Come on, make me feel alive! Feel alive... Come on, make me feel alive! Feel alive...
